author: paulhauner
content:
We just published a Lighthouse release-candidate which includes the updated TTD for Sepolia.

If you're going to follow the merge on Sepolia, update your node this week to ensure you're ready!

https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/releases/tag/v2.3.2-rc.0

author: ryanleeschneider
content: naming question (the best kind...): Is "Beacon API" still the "official" name of this API described here: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/ ?   Will the name stay the same or adopt "consensus" in the name to parallel the general shift from referring to the provided of this API as the Consensus Layer rather than a Beacon node?
